title: RUET holds seminar on higher education in US
body: The Carrier Forum of Rajshahi University of Engineering and Technology held a seminar titled Prospects of Higher Education in the United States at the RUET on Monday. In association with the RUET Students Welfare Office, the seminar was organised at the conference hall of the department of computer science and engineering, said a press release. Vice-chancellor Professor SM Abdur Razzaque, Students Welfare director Professor Rabiul Islam Sarker and assistant director Abu Ismail Siddiqui addressed the seminar as resource persons, disseminating their expertise on the issue. RUET students and representatives of education US and American Corner in Rajshahi joined the seminar sharing views about the issue. In the seminar, various issues, including eligibility for admission in different US universities, application process for visa, were presented. The seminar was informed that 20,156 Bangladeshis were staying in the US for higher education at present. According to the Institute of International Education, Bangladesh stands at ninth position in the list of quick growing countries of international students.
